author: eptwts
text:
i 100% agree...

AI is definitely powerful

but it's simply a tool to use to get something done better, faster and/or at scale, it will never be anything more than that

the only part about "AI taking over" that's true, is that AI is taking over basic 80IQ VA-level jobs

if you have basic biz fundamentals down, mixed with a touch of creativity, you're likely safe
